title: Region defined by radical function, vert. lines part - d

content.question: The vertical line x = k divides the region R into two regions such that when these two regions are revolved about the x–axis, they generate solids with equal volumes. Find the value of k

frqParts.text: The vertical line x = k divides the region R into two regions such that when these two regions are revolved about the x–axis, they generate solids with equal volumes. Find the value of k

topic.text: 8.9: Volume with Disc Method - Revolving Around the x- or y-Axis

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
